description: Work with me. Software Development. Architecture. Coding. Coaching.
name: Servcies
content: If you are looking for someone to realize your idea, you have found the right guy!

services.intro: Regardless of Web-App, native mobile client or IoT system, I help you...
items: ...dissect your idea into an actionable plan.
...select the right technologies to realize your idea.
...lay out a system design of required components and services.
